feed.title: alloy
feed.subtitle: "Alloy is a language for describing structures and a tool for exploring them. It has been used in a wide range of applications from finding holes in security mechanisms to designing telephone switching networks."

entry.title: welcome
entry.content: The Workshop on the Future of Alloy will be held in Cambridge, MA on April 30 & May 1 (more info).
entry.summary: The Workshop on the Future of Alloy will be held in Cambridge, MA on April 30 & May 1 (more info).
